reviewText:
There is no instructional content at all on this DVD. It gives a diagram of where the lighting is placed then moves right into the photo shoot where the model is strinking poses at 100 miles per hour with the camera firing as quick as a machine gun. Then a couple of the resulting images are shown and then the process repeats. No narraration.... nothing.

I think this DVD is good if you're looking for extremely softcore porn but nothing more.
